summary: Skimpy armor, gauntlets and boots replacer for UNP, includes DLCs. Each set comes with the 1st person views and it's available with or without BBP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]


Skimpy armor, gauntlets and boots replacer for UNP.
Each set comes with 1st person views and it's available with or without BBP.

Includes all female outfits in the armors folders + all DLCs.[/center][center][/center][center]This mod is a replacer, but there is now a standalone version by SamusKnight2K. Grab it here:
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68185/?]UNP Spice Gear Collection - Standalone Conversion[/url]
[/b]

[size=2]Also, here's a Dream Girl conversion, by dTd:
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68218/?]Spice Gear Collection for Dream Girl[/url]


[/b][/size][/center]

[center][/center][center][youtube]rUO3Iu_1u34[/youtube]  [/center]


Please note, these files include the panties textures from my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] (i didn't want to make a duplicate). You can overwrite these textures, or not (it's exactely the same). The no-panties patch from the minidresses mod will also work with this one.



[size=2][b][size=2]REQUIREMENTS FOR THE BASIC UNP VERSION:
[/size][/b]- UNP body meshes & textures.

[b]REQUIREMENTS FOR THE UNP-BBP VERSION:[/b]
- UNP body meshes & textures.
[/size]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT-PE[/url] (therefore HDT-PE requirements as well: compatible skeleton such as Groovtama's XPMSE and SKSE).

[u]
Note on the ESP file: [/u]
What Tiwa44_spicegear.esp modifies:
- Wolf boots and gauntlets armor addon mesh paths: fix for female's boots and gauntlets displaying as the male ones.
- Stormcloak boots armor addon mesh paths: fix for female's boots displaying as the male ones.


[size=2]CREDITS:[/size]
Dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]body[/url]. MrTroubleMaker for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/?]hands[/url]. Phygit for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3666/?]feet[/url]. Rest is my own adapted version of the vanilla stuff.

[size=2]SPECIAL THANKS[/size] to nortonn, Tarowe4, JonRC, jerryh72, dTd, Jeffreylane, SamusKnight2k, stoaty6666, SCHNEE4, Elgar82, harryharry989, suedetoy, Dimension7, AWP586, qq9062583, White Shadow, lunarossa, ssj7blade, brevi, circ, 999-jay-999, MrTroubleMaker, seden, Zarrastro, Pixiestone, monababii, wann8389, Adipsycho, Exoclyps, ImsumDave, Nightasy, Mr. Dave, the nif tools people, and dimon99 for the amazing UNP body, and Phygit who made the lovely feet.


[b][size=2]My other mod:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60636/?]
[/url]
author: tiwa44
